column4: Running sudo dhclient wlan0          Outputs this: No DHCPOFFERS received            Any ideas?
do you have working driver for wireless adapter?
yes, I have an XP driver installed and verified by ndiswrapper
is wg311 the name of your driver?
yes
are you sure the module is loaded? does it turn up when you do lsmod?
http://pastebin.com/8RAbTSYL
dude lsmod output has no wg311 listed. that probably means you don't have the driver installed
http://pastebin.com/aETFjwPK
sorry i'm not familiar with ndiswrapper
that's ok thanks though
stupid netgear!
maybe you need to load the driver...?
thought that's what I did already....maybe I am doing something wrong?
i thought ubuntu would set up wireless automatically? no?
this was an upgrade from 8.04 to 10.04.....guess not
maybe try a different driver?
maybe
or try ubuntu 11.4
heh, that's an option.
thanks again
ok... sorry I don't have experience with ndiswrapper
